entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -31.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 2:36 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -31.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -35.8°C
Wind: SE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
